summary:
- Developed the MVP for our mobile application using React Native under a tight deadline of one month, while juggling with schoolwork.
 - Developed the Only Rewards mobile application with at least 15 screens from scratch using the Flutter framework. This was part of Only Technologies' product launch on 7 August 2022. 
   - [Google Play link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.only.saferide)
   - [Apple App Store link](https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/only-rewards/id1622263310)
 - Designed and developed APIs using ExpressJS and AWS. AWS services used include S3, DynamoDB, AppSync, Cognito and Lambda.
